column5: Fiesta Sol is located right at the heart of SPI. Centrally located walking distance to the beach, restaurants, shopping and dining. This 2 bedroom 2 bath well kept condo sleeps 6. It is a ground floor unit with good size patios that will make it perfect for barbecuing. Enjoy the nice sized swimming pool or the sandy beach just steps away. This condo is sure to make your stay memorable and pleasant.
